title: 820-2915-A no backlight
message:
hi,

820-2915-A no backlight . i tried different screen but same  problem

L9000 = 3,3 voltage
j9000 pin 40 = 25 voltage
R9704 = No voltage 

u9600 Could the problem be with the u9600?

title: 820-2915-A no backlight
message:
"j9000 pin 40 = 25 voltage
R9704 = No voltage"
Steady 25V?
Really strange to get voltage there, without LCD_BKLT_PWM present.

Do you get image on internal LCD?
External video is OK?

title: 820-2915-A no backlight
message: I have one of these.   25v on pin 40.   Trying to figure it out.   Tried a test screen.  Still no back light.  Has image

title: 820-2915-A no backlight
message:
I think 15" LCD requires higher voltage.
Just in case, compare with working machine.

Tried changing U9701?
